Percy Standing https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_Standing 0 Percy Standing (26 October 1882 – 17 September 1950) was an English film actor of the silent era. He appeared in 42 films between 1913 and 1934. He was the son of Herbert Standing (1846–1923). Several of his brothers were actors including Sir Guy Standing, Wyndham Standing and Jack Standing. He was born in Lambeth, London and died in Placer County, California. Percy_Standing ( 26_October_1882 – 17_September_1950 ) was an_English_film_actor of the_silent_era . He appeared in 42_films between 1913_and_1934 . He was the_son of Herbert Standing (_1846 – 1923_) . Several of his_brothers were actors including Sir_Guy Standing , Wyndham_Standing_and_Jack_Standing . He was_born in Lambeth , London and died in Placer_County , California .
